text: Airwheel Intelligent good quality electrical scooter: No More Air Pollution. How to avoid the danger from heavy haze and how to reduce air pollution are the most tough problems that we are facing now. Airwheel intelligent scooter, representing the most eco-friendly and intelligent scooter, helps to solve the environmental problems. USA, 5 October 2015 -- How to avoid the danger from heavy haze and how to ease air pollution are the problems that everyone is facing and the topics being heated debated. Transport, powered by traditional energy, is leading people to a dilemma. All kinds of pollution, including air and noise pollution and the extensive extraction of nature resource cause too many problems. However, with the development of technology, some new kinds of transportation is entering the market and arousing people’s attention. Airwheel intelligent scooter is the most famous and outstanding one, which sells well around the globe. It represents an intelligent and green way of life. The hot sell of Airwheel electric scooter indicates the new age, which depends on science and technology, is coming soon.The key factor of identifying a transport is eco-friendly or not is finding out where its power comes from. Airwheel self-balancing scooter , which is powered by clean and renewable energy—electricity, wins at first. Every scooter of Airwheel, no matter it is from Q, X, S or A series, uses imported Sony and Panasonic li-ion power batteries. Compared with other batteries, it has longer lifespan, which could recharge at least 1800 times. It is also rather powerful, which could support a trip of 40 to 50 kilometers. Another point needs to be taken consideration is the output volume. It is not only compact and fashionable, but also safe and pollution-free. Airwheel electric scooter is outfitted with the most intelligent chip, which has the new aerospace attitude control theory, fuzzy software algorithm and gyroscope system to realize self-balance. It costs only one Walt per hundred kilometer. Airwheel turns sustainable production and consumption into reality. Less consumption and exhaust, more fresh air and health. In 2015, let’s choose Airwheel self-balancing scooter , the leader of the whole scooter industry. Green life and green transport will be an inevitable part of the world. While enjoying the high-tech products, let’s shoulder more responsibility to ensure the environmental protection. We will see the blue sky and breathe the fresh air soon. # # #
